mapper.select: select u.userName, u.userSex, u.userAge, d.deptName, r.roleName, u.userEmail, u.userProvince, u.userCity, u.userCommunity, u.userInterTime, u.userState from grapeems_user u, grapeems_dept d, grapeems_role r where u.deptId = d.deptId and u.roleId = r.roleId and u.isDeleted = 1
select * from grapeems_user where userEmail = #{userEmail} and isDeleted = 1
